body_content.explanation: not the same in all parts or areas:
examples: The material was inspected and found to be of non-uniform thickness.
The temperature distribution within the container is non-uniform.
Unfortunately ID was requested and checked in a nonuniform fashion at the doors.

body_content.explanation: not part of a uniform (= a particular set of clothes that have to be worn by members of the same organization or group of people):
examples: She was given detention for wearing a non-uniform skirt.

body_content.explanation: A non-uniform day is one when you do not need to wear your uniform (= a particular set of clothes that have to be worn by members of the same organization or group of people):
examples: Fridays are non-uniform days so we can wear whatever we like to school.

body_content.explanation: clothes that are not the same as those that usually have to be worn by members of the same organization or group of people:
examples: The soldiers were disciplined for wearing non-uniform.
The debate about uniform or non-uniform has diverted attention from the bigger issues.
